sig_info: If Morningstar has less than 1 Captured Souls at the start of a fight, she gains 1.

Morningstar’s weapon grants her a link to her Opponent’s Soul, allowing her to siphon away a portion of the power from any Fury, Power Gain, or Regeneration Buffs they trigger, reducing their potency by 25 to 50.01%, and granting her her own Buff.
Fury: +22.83 to 45.66 Attack for 15 Seconds.
Regeneration: +70.69 to 141.4 Health over 15 Seconds.
Power Gain: +11.25 to 22.5% Power over 15 Seconds.
